languages.text: "Согласна с каждым словом, шерин. Но кто посмеет упрекнуть Вольного Торговца в его решении, {mf|того|ту}, {mf|кому|которой} сам Великий наделил частицей своей ослепительной славы? Молюсь, чтобы Он послал вашему сердцу прихоть изменить свое решение".

"I agree with every word, shereen. But who would dare question the Rogue Trader's decision to attend a little party? After all, was it not the Exalted One Himself who granted the Rogue Trader a fraction of His own dazzling glory? I pray that He might send your heart the urge to reconsider."
languages.original_text: "Согласна с каждым словом, шерин. Но кто посмеет упрекнуть Вольного Торговца в его решении, {mf|того|ту}, {mf|кому|которой} сам Великий наделил частицей своей ослепительной славы? Молюсь, чтобы Он послал вашему сердцу прихоть изменить свое решение".

traits.locale_text: "I agree with every word, shereen. But who would dare question the Rogue Trader's decision to attend a little party? After all, was it not the Exalted One Himself who granted the Rogue Trader a fraction of His own dazzling glory? I pray that He might send your heart the urge to reconsider."

"I agree with every word, shereen. But who would dare question the Rogue Trader's decision to attend a little party? After all, was it not the Exalted One Himself who granted the Rogue Trader a fraction of His own dazzling glory? I pray that He might send your heart the urge to reconsider."

"I agree with every word, shereen. But who would dare question the Rogue Trader's decision to attend a little party? After all, was it not the Exalted One Himself who granted the Rogue Trader a fraction of His own dazzling glory? I pray that He might send your heart the urge to reconsider."

"I agree with every word, shereen. But who would dare question the Rogue Trader's decision to attend a little party? After all, was it not the Exalted One Himself who granted the Rogue Trader a fraction of His own dazzling glory? I pray that He might send your heart the urge to reconsider."

languages.text: “我完全同意你的看法，亲爱的。不过，就算行商浪人打算参加一场小小的聚会，又有谁胆敢质疑这样的决定呢？毕竟，行商浪人可是得到了至高无上的神皇本人的恩赐，得到了祂一小部分无上的荣耀。我向祂祈祷，希望祂能让你重新考虑考虑。”
languages.original_text: "I agree with every word, shereen. But who would dare question the Rogue Trader's decision to attend a little party? After all, was it not the Exalted One Himself who granted the Rogue Trader a fraction of His own dazzling glory? I pray that He might send your heart the urge to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: “我完全同意你的看法，亲爱的。不过，就算行商浪人打算参加一场小小的聚会，又有谁胆敢质疑这样的决定呢？毕竟，行商浪人可是得到了至高无上的神皇本人的恩赐，得到了祂一小部分无上的荣耀。我向祂祈祷，希望祂能让你重新考虑考虑。”

languages.text: 「まったくそのとおりだね、シェリーン。でも、ローグトレーダーがパーティに出席することに、あえて疑問を呈する者がいるかい？結局、ローグトレーダーに一握りの目もくらむばかりの栄光を与えたのは、エグザルテッド・ワンじゃないのかい？アタシは、主があなたの心を考え直させてくれるよう願ってるよ」
languages.original_text: "I agree with every word, shereen. But who would dare question the Rogue Trader's decision to attend a little party? After all, was it not the Exalted One Himself who granted the Rogue Trader a fraction of His own dazzling glory? I pray that He might send your heart the urge to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: 「まったくそのとおりだね、シャリーン。でも、ローグトレーダーがパーティに出席することに、あえて疑問を呈する者がいるかい？結局、ローグトレーダーに一握りの目もくらむばかりの栄光を与えたのは、エグザルテッド・ワンじゃないのかい？アタシは、主があなたの心を考え直させてくれるよう願ってるよ」

languages.text: «Estoy plenamente de acuerdo con lo que dice, shereen, pero ¿quién cuestionaría la decisión de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente si quiere asistir a una fiestecita? A fin de cuentas, el propio Exaltado le dio una fracción de su propia gloria, ¿no? Ruego que conceda a su corazón la voluntad de cambiar de idea».
languages.original_text: "I agree with every word, shereen. But who would dare question the Rogue Trader's decision to attend a little party? After all, was it not the Exalted One Himself who granted the Rogue Trader a fraction of His own dazzling glory? I pray that He might send your heart the urge to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy plenamente de acuerdo con lo que dice, shereen, pero ¿quién cuestionaría la decisión de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente si quiere asistir a una fiestecita? A fin de cuentas, el propio Exaltado le dio una fracción de su propia gloria, ¿no? Ruego que conceda a su corazón la voluntad de cambiar de idea».

languages.text: « Je ne peux qu'acquiescer, shereen, mais qui oserait critiquer {mf|libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {mf|s'il|si elle} décidait d'assister à une petite célébration ? Après tout, n'est-ce pas l'Exalté en personne qui lui a accordé une fraction de Sa gloire étincelante ? Je prie pour qu'Il parvienne à convaincre votre cœur de changer d'avis. »
languages.original_text: "I agree with every word, shereen. But who would dare question the Rogue Trader's decision to attend a little party? After all, was it not the Exalted One Himself who granted the Rogue Trader a fraction of His own dazzling glory? I pray that He might send your heart the urge to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux qu'acquiescer, shereen, mais qui oserait critiquer {mf|libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {mf|s'il|si elle} décidait d'assister à une petite célébration ? Après tout, n'est-ce pas l'Exalté en personne qui lui a accordé une fraction de Sa gloire étincelante ? Je prie pour qu'Il parvienne à convaincre votre cœur de changer d'avis. »

languages.text: "Ich stimme jedem einzelnen Wort zu, Shereen. Aber wer würde es wagen, die Entscheidung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} in Frage zu stellen, eine kleine Feier zu besuchen? War es nicht der Erhabene selbst, der {mf|dem Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} einen Teil Seines eigenen strahlenden Rums überlassen hat? Ich bete, dass Er Eurem Herzen den Drang verleiht, die Sache noch mal zu überdenken."
languages.original_text: "I agree with every word, shereen. But who would dare question the Rogue Trader's decision to attend a little party? After all, was it not the Exalted One Himself who granted the Rogue Trader a fraction of His own dazzling glory? I pray that He might send your heart the urge to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: "Ich stimme jedem einzelnen Wort zu, Shereen. Aber wer würde es wagen, die Entscheidung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} in Frage zu stellen, eine kleine Feier zu besuchen? War es nicht der Erhabene selbst, der {mf|dem Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} einen Teil Seines eigenen strahlenden Rums überlassen hat? Ich bete, dass Er Eurem Herzen den Drang verleiht, die Sache noch mal zu überdenken."

languages.text: "Söylediğin her sözcüğe katılıyorum şirinim. Fakat Hür Tacir'in küçük bir partiye katılma kararı almasını kim sorgulayabilir ki? Nihayetinde Hür Tacir'e kendi ışıl ışıl şanının bir parçasını bahşeden bizzat Görkemli değil miydi? Kalbine tekrar düşünme isteği göndermesi için O'na dua edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I agree with every word, shereen. But who would dare question the Rogue Trader's decision to attend a little party? After all, was it not the Exalted One Himself who granted the Rogue Trader a fraction of His own dazzling glory? I pray that He might send your heart the urge to reconsider."

traits.locale_text: "Söylediğin her sözcüğe katılıyorum şirinim. Ama Hür Tacir'in küçük bir partiye katılma kararı almasını kim sorgulayabilir ki? Nihayetinde Hür Tacir'e kendi ışıl ışıl şanının bir parçasını bahşeden bizzat Görkemli değil miydi? Kalbine tekrar düşünme isteği göndermesi için O'na dua edeceğim."
